case.title: The main page should be opened after clicking the “Huntd” logo.
There should be an ability to move to the “For Companies” page after clicking on the “For Companies” link.
The “For Companies” page should contain the [HIRE ENGINEERS].
The “For Companies” page should contain the [FREE SIGN UP].
The “For Companies” page should contain the “Sign In” link.

The “For Companies” page should contain the partner’s logos.
